title: Ethical concerns with criminal gang study

content.question: Helmut wants to see how membership in a criminal gang influences a new memberâ€™s behavior. He plans on observing the day-to-day behaviors of members of the criminal gang. Why might an Institutional Review Board (IRB) have ethical concerns about this study?

choices.label: Helmut may observe illegal activities that force him to break confidentiality.
Gang members will not be able to provide informed consent.
If members provided consent, they would not have the right to withdraw from the study.
It would be difficult in the written report to keep the names of the participants anonymous.

content.answer: Helmut may observe illegal activities that force him to break confidentiality.

skill.text: 2.D: Evaluate whether a psychological research scenario followed appropriate ethical procedures.
